lostPassword.title: Reset Password
lostPassword.subtitle: Manual password reset procedure
lostPassword.step1: Locate the application configuration file at config/config.json (mapped to /config in the container).
lostPassword.step2: Open it and find the "password" key. It currently contains a hashed value.
lostPassword.step3: Clear the value so it becomes an empty string (or remove the hash, keeping the key):
lostPassword.step4: Save the file and restart the container.
lostPassword.step5: When the app starts again it will detect no password and will prompt you to create a new one.
lostPassword.note: Security note: anyone with filesystem access can reset the password this way. Ensure proper host-level access controls.
